CustomField.description: Critical data point for financial services reporting
CustomField.formula: Net_Tuition__c - Amount_Paid__c - Tentative_Pell_Grant_Amount__c - Tentative_Student_Loan_Amount__c - Tentative_Parent_Loan_Amount__c - Tentative_Private_Loan_Amount__c - Deposit_Amount__c - Verto_Fund_Amount__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Net Tuition minus Amount Paid, Tentative Pell Grant Amount, tentative loan amounts, Verto Fund Amount and Deposit Amount
CustomField.label: Estimated Amount Due
